name: Daggerfall Unity
description: Daggerfall Workshop is the home of Interkarma’s tools for exploring Daggerfall. The Workshop has been through several incarnations over the years, from a personal hobby site to a full-blown hub of activity with thousands of unique visitors. Some of those became mainstays of the community, contributing their own visions and particular talents. Things have come full circle now, and Daggerfall Workshop is once again a personal hobby site.
